coref_content: Los Angeles, Calif., Sept. 29, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Legal - Bay LLC, the Lawsuit Settlement Funding Company, report Sept. 29, 2015 that Johnson & Johnsons Ethicon unit recently request a Texas appellate court to throw out a $ 1.2 million jury verdict against Johnson & Johnsons Ethicon unit. a $ 1.2 million jury verdict against they be award to a woman who say a woman who say she be injure by Ethicons TVT - O pelvic mesh be injure by Ethicons TVT - O pelvic mesh, however, Ethicon be request throw because Johnson & Johnsons Ethicon unit believe there be nt enough evidence that Ethicons TVT - O pelvic mesh be defective in Ethicons TVT - O pelvic mesh's design. Johnson & Johnsons Ethicon unit also argue that a woman who say she be injure by Ethicons TVT - O pelvic mesh only have speculative evidence that a woman who say she be injure by Ethicons TVT - O pelvic mesh's injury may have be cause due to Ethicons TVT - O pelvic mesh. a $ 1.2 million jury verdict against they be award to a woman who say she be injure by Ethicons TVT - O pelvic mesh in April of 2014, however, the jury decline to award any punitive damage after find that Johnson & Johnsons Ethicon unit provide adequate warning of the risk that be know. logo - photos.prnewswire sponsor by : Legal - Bay LLC, the Lawsuit Settlement Funding Company, be a leader in transvaginal mesh, transvaginal tape, and bladder or pelvic sling, as well as verdict on appeal settlement advance for all case, include large hip recall verdict and mesh case. Legal - Bay LLC, the Lawsuit Settlement Funding Company put a major focus on commercial litigation in 2015 and have recently fund large verdict on appeal case, include a Miami, Florida verdict worth several million dollar. Legal - Bay LLC, the Lawsuit Settlement Funding Company have also fund large whistleblower or Qui Tam lawsuit for plaintiff, as well as attorney funding for attorney who be wait to be pay on verdict on appeal case who need fund to continue to defend the appeal process. Chris Janish, CEO of Legal - Bay LLC, the Lawsuit Settlement Funding Company, comment on the company focus on judgment and verdict on appeal case, Legal - Bay LLC, the Lawsuit Settlement Funding Company be one of the few company that have fully secure substantial capital and adequate underwriter to fund large verdict on appeal case that will take year to settle. these case can be very risky since the verdict can be reduce to nothing on appeal, and in most appeal the legal aspect of the case can be very tricky. this be why plaintiff and plaintiff's lawyer trust Legal - Bay LLC, the Lawsuit Settlement Funding Company for facilitate plaintiff and their lawyer's cash - flow need well than any other legal funding company industry wide. Legal - Bay LLC, the Lawsuit Settlement Funding Company can also assist injure party who believe injure party who believe they may have a possible hip recall or transvaginal mesh claim may have a possible hip recall or transvaginal mesh claim. if you, or a love one, have be injure from a transvaginal mesh product or bladder sling, please feel free to contact Legal - Bay LLC, the Lawsuit Settlement Funding Company with any question you may have. Legal - Bay LLC, the Lawsuit Settlement Funding Company can assist you with obtain a free legal consultation from a qualified transvaginal mesh law firm or TVM lawyer, or a hip recall law firm. to learn more about Legal - Bays transvaginal mesh funding or legal service, please visit the website at : lawsuitssettlementfunding to learn more about commercial litigation case, visit : Legal - Bay LLC, the Lawsuit Settlement Funding Company have now secure additional funding capital for other type of commercial litigation case include, but not limit to : judgment on Appeal or verdict on Appeal case, Qui Tam or Whistle Blower case, breach of contract case, Security Fraud or Stock arbitration case, patent or copyright infringement, intellectual property dispute, anti - trust lawsuit, large wrongful termination case, legal malpractice dispute, franchise protection case, real estate dispute, banking dispute case, royalty payment dispute, estate or Trust dispute, construction dispute, and environmental dispute. all of Legal - Bay LLC, the Lawsuit Settlement Funding Company program be non - recourse lawsuit cash advance, also know as case funding. none of Legal - Bays program should be consider to be a lawsuit loan, lawsuit loan, pre - settlement loan or a pre - settlement loan. to learn more about how Legal - Bay LLC, the Lawsuit Settlement Funding Company funding process work on commercial litigation, visit : lawsuitssettlementfunding to speak with a live agent on any of the above item feel free to call the company toll free hotline at : 877.571.0405. source : Legal - Bay LLC, the Lawsuit Settlement Funding Company contact : Patty Kirby, COO / Head of Client Relations ph. 877.571.0405 email : to view the original version on PR Newswire, visit : SOURCE Legal - Bay LLC.
